Reviews.Title: “Nice location friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: titoboy
Reviews.Content: stayed dec 22 27 nice location accessible heathrow airport via picadilly line easy bus gatwick walk 10 15 minutes 2 bus stops hotel staff friendly helpful breakfast bad aida charge housekeeping breakfast offered cook omelet eggs restaurant breakfast guests eat food bought outside kitchen christmas day stand london transportation whatsover walked harrods 15 20 minutes hyde park 30 bad hotel classified 2 3 star

Reviews.Title: “very good for the price”

Reviews.Content: location 50 earls court station expecting hostel lovely accommodation basic clean adequate free wifi breakfast staff friendly helpful hotel stayed london price

Reviews.Title: “perfect for the price”

Reviews.Content: friend decided share hotel instead staying hostel hotel price location perfect handy underground safe clean plenty lovely restaurants pubs chemists supermarkets clean neat breakfast reception staff polite definitely stay
